name: Transporter Truck Car Mission
description:
Transporter Truck Car Mission 2 is ultimate car driving games for all transportation games fans to utilize city driving school car driving skills to perform multilevel truck transport duty. In crazy car driving simulator drive sport cars, offroad jeep in urban city environment. Be a USA truck sport car transporter and enjoy urban city roads in this car transport simulator . You as an exotic car pro driver first drive extreme car to truck parking spot on cargo while driving in limited timeframe. In car driving game carefully drive because your ignorance while showing crazy car driving skills will crash the health bar.
Features:
- Real time tricky car transport truck driving experience!
- Excellent sound effects and engine sounds!
- Multiple gameplay Scenarios with Transportation missions!
- Car tycoon transport Different Vehicles on your Cargo Truck!
- New parking and transport skill to learn
- Multiple driving controls
- Offroad trucking adventure.
